title: Jiří Uhříček
description: Tomas Porupka is the lead legal counsel for Elegance Fund, bringing over 15 years of experience in real estate law and high-value transactions. Specializing in luxury property development and acquisitions, he ensures projects are legally sound and strategically advantageous. His expertise in regulatory frameworks and negotiation makes him essential to the fund, safeguarding its interests and maintaining its reputation for excellence in luxury real estate investments.
